Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EliA Ro52 and EliA Ro60 immunoassays measuring IgG antibodies to Ro52 and Ro60 using automated fluorescence enzyme immunoassay platforms for autoimmune disease diagnosis.
Indications for Use Summary: EliA Ro52: For semi-quantitative measurement of IgG antibodies to Ro52 in human serum to aid diagnosis of Sjögren's syndrome, SLE, systemic sclerosis and idiopathic inflammatory myopathies; EliA Ro60: For semi-quantitative measurement of IgG antibodies to Ro60 in human serum to aid diagnosis of Sjögren's syndrome and SLE, both for use with other laboratory and clinical findings.
